nodes.title: How to Create Burned-In Subtitles with Adobe Premiere Pro 2024
nodes.description: Learn how to create professional burned-in subtitles with Premiere Pro 2024. This guide covers everything from adding text to final export. Check it out!
nodes.coverAlt: How to Create Burned-In Subtitles with Adobe Premiere Pro 2024

nodes.title: How to Add Subtitles to YouTube Videos
nodes.description: Learn how to easily add subtitles to your YouTube videos to enhance accessibility and reach a wider audience.
nodes.coverAlt: How to Add Subtitles to YouTube Videos

nodes.title: The Best Font Colours For Subtitles
nodes.description: The best font for subtitles has to be readable. Find out what are the best colours for subtitles to make your text easily readable.
nodes.coverAlt: The Best Font Colours For Subtitles

nodes.title: How To Translate Your Videos To Bahasa Indonesia
nodes.description: Quickly translate your videos to Bahasa Indonesia in 3 simple steps. Find out how here!
nodes.coverAlt: How To Translate Your Videos To Bahasa Indonesia

nodes.title: How To Add Watermark For YouTube Videos
nodes.description: Your videos keep on getting stolen? Find out why you should add watermarks to your video and how you can add one!
nodes.coverAlt: How To Add Watermark For YouTube Videos

nodes.title: How To Create Burned In Subtitles
nodes.description: Find out in this article about different types of video subtitle burning, when to use burned in subtitles, and different ways to create burned in subtitles.
nodes.coverAlt: How To Create Burned In Subtitles

nodes.title: How To Add Text In Adobe Premiere Pro
nodes.description: Adding text can make your videos more appealing. This article will tell you multiple ways on how you can add text to your video with Adobe Premiere Pro!
nodes.coverAlt: How To Add Text In Adobe Premiere Pro

nodes.title: Multiple Ways To Translate Your YouTube Videos
nodes.description: Find out multiple ways to translate your YouTube videos without spending years learning different languages!

nodes.title: How To Add Subtitles To YouTube, Facebook and LinkedIn Videos
nodes.description: This post will talk about different easy ways that you can create and add subtitles to your YouTube, Facebook and LinkedIn videos!
nodes.coverAlt: How To Add Subtitles To YouTube, Facebook and LinkedIn Video

nodes.title: How To Import And Edit SRT File To Adobe Premiere Pro
nodes.description: This post will talk about what an SRT is, different ways to create an SRT file, how to import and edit an SRT file to Adobe Premiere Pro, and how to export video subtitles in Adobe Premiere Pro.
nodes.coverAlt: How To Import And Edit SRT File To Adobe Premiere Pro

nodes.title: Leaving A Long-Lasting Legacy: Curating Your Familyâ€™s History
nodes.description: Join us as we tell the story of Jeff Dormish, who wants to pass on his family history to his children as part of his legacy, and how he inspired the Video Translator team.
nodes.coverAlt: Meninggalkan Warisan Jangka Panjang: Mengurasi Sejarah Keluarga Anda

nodes.title: Why Should You Translate Video Content: A Client Perspective
nodes.description: A prospect who runs a professional YouTube channel wanted to convert his content from English to German.
nodes.coverAlt: A clients perspective on why you should translate video content.

nodes.title: Video Translation And Its Implications For FireTech
nodes.description: Talking to FireTech's Leigh Kelson, we cover the origins of the video translator app, and what video translation can do for clients. We also cover the role of AI and ML in the language space.
nodes.coverAlt: Video Translation And Its Implications For FireTech

nodes.title: How Subtitling Can Boost ROI
nodes.description:
AI internationalization has a important role to play in boosting your
  video ROI or ROAS. What are the options, and how can you optimize your content production
  process to take advantage of this mega-trend?
nodes.coverAlt: AI Internationalization: How Subtitling Can Boost ROI

nodes.title: Clients: Why You Make Me Blush!
nodes.description:
A client picked up some bugs in our application. They helped us find
  the source of the bugs. And then they blew us away with their feedback
nodes.coverAlt: Clients: Why You Make Me Blush!

nodes.title: Accessibility: Why It Matters And How To Avoid Being Sued
nodes.description:
A hearing impaired couple is suing a hospital for not providing disability
  friendly facilities. Is this justified? How can you avoid being sued for not meeting
  accessibility requirements?
nodes.coverAlt: Accessibility: Why It Matters And How To Avoid Being Sued

nodes.title: What Arabic Voices are Available?
nodes.description:
In this article we're looking at our Arabic speaking AI and the different
  voices available. We look at what Male and Female Arabic AI's sound like. Have a
  listen!
nodes.coverAlt: What Arabic Voices are Available?

nodes.title: Open Captions: Enhancements November 2019
nodes.description:
In this visual guide we look at new enhancements in the video translator
  app aimed at making open captions more user friendly. Now add labels where ever
  you require.
nodes.coverAlt: Open Captions: Enhancements November 2019

nodes.title: Transcribing Indian English: A Simple Guide To Using AI To Speed Up Transcription   And Add Open Captions
nodes.description:
In this visual guide we used an Indian English AI to transcribe a video
  from Rajya Sabha TV. After the transcription we used post-editing to clean up our
  captions. Finally, we use the Auto-Overlay functionality to add open captions to
  our video.
nodes.coverAlt: Transcribing Indian English: A Simple Guide To Using AI To Speed Up Transcription   And Add Open Captions

nodes.title: How Do I Make Subtitles And Closed Captions?
nodes.description:
Many clients ask how us about subtitles. Generally, this is the first
  question a prospect asks us about our platform. In practise, they mean a few different
  things.
nodes.coverAlt: How Do I Make Subtitles And Closed Captions?
